'''''War in Heaven''''' was the first novel published by [[Charles Williams]]. The graphic novel ''[[Heaven's War]]'', a fictional story about [[Charles Williams]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[C.S. Lewis]], was a play on the title of Williams's book.
